TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecurityTokenHandlerCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler>

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of security token handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The new collection does not contain any handlers.

Docs.param: The token handlers with which to initialize the new instance.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified token handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Do not use this constructor to attempt to clone an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection>class, use the **Clone** method instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The new collection does not contain any handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddOrReplace(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler handler) cil managed

Docs.param: The token handler to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified token handler to this collection. If a handler with the same token type identifier as the specified handler already exists in the collection, it is replaced with the specified handler.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool CanReadKeyIdentifierClause(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed

Docs.param: An XML reader positioned at the start element. The reader should not be advanced.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified key identifier clause can be read by one of the handlers in this collection or by the base .
Docs.returns: if the key identifier clause can be read; otherwise .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed

Docs.param: An XML reader positioned at the start element. The reader should not be advanced.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool CanReadToken(string tokenString) cil managed

Docs.param: The token represented as a string.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified string representation of a token can be read by one of the handlers in this collection.
Docs.returns: if the collection contains a token handler that can read the specified token; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The method invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.CanReadToken%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> method on the token handlers (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler>) in the collection to determine whether the token can be read.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool CanReadToken(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed

Docs.param: An XML reader positioned at the start element. The reader should not be advanced.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified token can be read by one of the handlers in this collection.
Docs.returns: if the token can be read; otherwise .

Docs.param: The security token to be serialized.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified token can be serialized by one of the handlers in this collection.
Docs.returns: if the token can be serialized by one of the handlers; otherwise .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ClearItems() cil managed

Docs.summary: Clears all of the handlers from this collection. (Override of the base class method.)
Gets and sets the base configuration for this security token handler collection.
Docs.value: The configuration for the token handler collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection CreateDefaultSecurityTokenHandlerCollection() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a system default collection of basic security token handlers, each of which has the system default configuration. The token handlers in this collection must be configured with service specific data before they can be used.
Docs.returns: A security token handler collection that contains the default, basic security token handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection CreateDefaultSecurityTokenHandlerCollection(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration configuration) cil managed

Docs.param: The configuration to associate with the handler collection.
Docs.summary: Creates a system default collection of basic security token handlers and associates the specified configuration with the new collection. Each of the handlers has the system default configuration. The token handlers in this collection must be configured with service specific data before they can be used.
Docs.returns: A security token handler collection that contains the default, basic security token handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken CreateToken(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor tokenDescriptor) cil managed

Docs.param: The token descriptor from which the token is to be created. Properties of the token descriptor are set before this method is called.
Docs.summary: Creates a token from the specified token descriptor.
Docs.returns: A security token that matches the properties of the token descriptor.

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which the handler should be inserted.
The token handler to insert.
Docs.summary: Inserts the specified token handler in this collection at the specified index. (Override of the base class method.)

Docs.param: The token for which the handler should be returned.
Docs.summary: Gets a token handler from this collection that can handle the specified security token.
Docs.value: A token handler that can handle the specified token.

Docs.param: A URI that identifies the token type.
Docs.summary: Gets a token handler from this collection that can handle the specified type identifier.
Docs.value: A token handler that can handle tokens that correspond to the specified type identifier.

Docs.param: The type of the token to be handled.
Docs.summary: Gets the handler from this collection that can handle the specified token type.
Docs.value: A token handler that can handle tokens of the specified type.
